dcterms:creator: Ankush Chatterjee
Kedhar Nath Narahari
Meghana Joshi
Puneet Agrawal
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for detecting emotions in textual conversations, where each conversation consists of three turns of utterances, and the task is to identify the emotion of the last utterance based on the context provided by the first two utterances.
dcterms:title: EmoContext

dcterms:creator: Alec Go
Richa Bhayani
Lei Huang
dcterms:description: A dataset used for sentiment classification, consisting of tweets labeled with positive and negative sentiments, utilized for fine-tuning word embeddings.
dcterms:title: Twitter Sentiment Dataset

dcterms:creator: Jeffrey Pennington
Richard Socher
Christopher Manning
dcterms:description: A dataset providing global vectors for word representation, used to enhance word embeddings in various NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: GloVe

dcterms:creator: Bjarke Felbo
Alan Mislove
Anders Søgaard
Iyad Rahwan
Sune Lehmann
dcterms:description: A dataset used for learning sentence representations based on emoji occurrences, aimed at detecting sentiment, emotion, and sarcasm.
dcterms:title: DeepMoji

dcterms:creator: Alexis Conneau
Douwe Kiela
Holger Schwenk
Loïc Barrault
Antoine Bordes
dcterms:description: A dataset for supervised learning of universal sentence representations from natural language inference data, used for various NLP tasks.
dcterms:title: InferSent
